trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered pair of integer x- and y-coordinates that defines a point in a two-dimensional plane.
trans-unit.target: Consente di rappresentare una coppia ordinata di coordinate di valori interi x- e y per definire un punto in un piano a due dimensioni.

trans-unit.source: To convert a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> to a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>, use <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Implicit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Per convertire un <xref:System.Drawing.Point> per un <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>, utilizzare <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Implicit%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates points and sizes using several of the overloaded operators defined for these types.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente crea punti e dimensioni tramite vari operatori di overload definiti per questi tipi.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> class.
trans-unit.target: Viene inoltre illustrato come utilizzare la <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è progettato per essere utilizzato con Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Create a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `subtractButton`.
trans-unit.target: Creare un form contenente un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> denominato `subtractButton`.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and call the `CreatePointsAndSizes` method from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Incollare il codice nel form e chiamare il `CreatePointsAndSizes` metodo del form <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> gestione degli eventi, passando `e` come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> class with the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> con le coordinate specificate.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the coordinates for the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> che specifica le coordinate della nuova classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> class from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operator and how to construct a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> from a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> or two integers.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operatore e come costruire un <xref:System.Drawing.Point> da un <xref:System.Drawing.Size> o due valori integer.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Viene inoltre illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è progettato per essere utilizzato con Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`, and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Incollare il codice in un form contenente un pulsante denominato `Button1`e associare il `Button1_Click` (metodo) con il pulsante <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> evento.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that specifies the coordinates for the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Intero a 32 bit che specifica le coordinate del nuovo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> class using coordinates specified by an integer value.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> utilizzando coordinate specificate da un valore di tipo Integer.

trans-unit.source: The low-order 16 bits of the `dw` parameter specify the horizontal x-coordinate and the higher 16 bits specify the vertical y-coordinate for the new <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: 16 bit meno significativi del `dw` parametro specifica la coordinata orizzontale e i 16 bit superiori specifica la coordinata y verticale per il nuovo <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructors and the <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> costruttori e <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumerazione.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a Windows Form that contains a label named `Label1`, and call the `IntializeLabel1` method in the form's constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollare il codice in un Windows Form che contiene un'etichetta denominata `Label1`e chiamare il `IntializeLabel1` metodo nel costruttore del form.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal position of the point.
trans-unit.target: Posizione orizzontale del punto.

trans-unit.source: The vertical position of the point.
trans-unit.target: Posizione verticale del punto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> class with the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> con le coordinate specificate.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operator and how to construct a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> from a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> or two integers.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operatore e come costruire un <xref:System.Drawing.Point> da un <xref:System.Drawing.Size> o due valori integer.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Viene inoltre illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è progettato per essere utilizzato con Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`, and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Incollare il codice in un form contenente un pulsante denominato `Button1`e associare il `Button1_Click` (metodo) con il pulsante <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> to add
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge la struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> specificata a un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that is the result of the addition operation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> che rappresenta il risultato dell'operazione di aggiunta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Add%2A> adds the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> of the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Size> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Add%2A> aggiunge il <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> dell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Drawing.Size> per il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> i valori del punto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il metodo <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Add%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollarlo in un Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `AddPoint` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Handle del modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventi e chiamate di `AddPoint` metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> gestione degli eventi, passando `e` come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> by rounding the values of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to the next higher integer values.
trans-unit.target: Converte la struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> specificata in una struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> arrotondando i valori della struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> agli interi immediatamente più alti.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> this method converts to.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in cui questo metodo esegue la conversione.

trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that has <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> values set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> che presenta i valori <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> impostati su zero.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Object" /> da verificare.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> contains the same coordinates as the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: Specifica se questo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> contiene le stesse coordinate dell'elemento <see cref="T:System.Object" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> and has the same coordinates as this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="obj" /> è una classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> e ha le stesse coordinate di questa classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un codice hash per <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Intero che specifica un valore hash per <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: You should avoid depending on <xref:System.Drawing.Point.GetHashCode%2A> for unique values, as two <xref:System.Drawing.Point> objects with the same values for their <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties may return the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: È consigliabile evitare di in base alle <xref:System.Drawing.Point.GetHashCode%2A> per i valori univoci, come due <xref:System.Drawing.Point> oggetti con gli stessi valori per i relativi <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> proprietà possono restituire lo stesso codice hash.

trans-unit.source: This behavior could change in a future release.
trans-unit.target: Questo comportamento potrebbe cambiare nelle versioni future.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se questa matrice <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> è vuota.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> are 0; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il valore di entrambe le proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> è 0; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Translates the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in base al valore specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> used offset this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> utilizzato come offset dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: Translates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in base all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: This method adjusts the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of this <xref:System.Drawing.Point> to the sum of the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of this <xref:System.Drawing.Point> and `p`.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo consente di regolare il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> i valori di questo <xref:System.Drawing.Point> alla somma dei valori di <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> i valori di questo <xref:System.Drawing.Point> e `p`.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Offset%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il metodo <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Offset%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollarlo in un Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `OffsetPoint` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Handle del modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventi e chiamate di `OffsetPoint` metodo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> gestione degli eventi, passando `e` come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The amount to offset the x-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: Valore di offset della coordinata x.

trans-unit.source: The amount to offset the y-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: Valore di offset della coordinata y.

trans-unit.source: Translates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Trasla l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in base al valore specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the pair of numbers to add to the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> che specifica la coppia di numeri da aggiungere alle coordinate di <c>pt</c>.

trans-unit.source: Translates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> by a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte un elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in base a un determinato elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> convertito.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates points and sizes using several of the overloaded operators defined for these types.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente crea punti e dimensioni tramite vari operatori di overload definiti per questi tipi.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> class.
trans-unit.target: Viene inoltre illustrato come utilizzare la <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è progettato per essere utilizzato con Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Create a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `subtractButton`.
trans-unit.target: Creare un form contenente un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> denominato `subtractButton`.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and call the `CreatePointsAndSizes` method from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Incollare il codice nel form e chiamare il `CreatePointsAndSizes` metodo del form <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> gestione degli eventi, passando `e` come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due oggetti <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The result specifies whether the values of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> properties of the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: Il risultato specifica se i valori delle proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> dei due oggetti <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> sono uguali.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> values of <paramref name="left" /> and <paramref name="right" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se i valori <paramref name="left" /> e <paramref name="right" /> delle proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> sono uguali; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operator and how to construct a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> from a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> or two integers.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operatore e come costruire un <xref:System.Drawing.Point> da un <xref:System.Drawing.Size> o due valori integer.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Viene inoltre illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è progettato per essere utilizzato con Windows Form.

trans-unit.target: Incollare il codice in un form contenente un pulsante denominato `Button1`e associare il `Button1_Click` (metodo) con il pulsante <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> evento.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to be converted.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Converte la struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> specificata in una struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that results from the conversion.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> risultante dalla conversione.

trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente crea punti e dimensioni tramite vari operatori di overload definiti per questi tipi.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> class.
trans-unit.target: Viene inoltre illustrato come utilizzare la <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> classe.

trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è progettato per essere utilizzato con Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Create a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `subtractButton`.
trans-unit.target: Creare un form contenente un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> denominato `subtractButton`.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and call the `CreatePointsAndSizes` method from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to be converted.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Converte la struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> specificata in una struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> that results from the conversion.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> risultante dalla conversione.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a shadow to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using overloaded operators.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente aggiunge un'ombreggiatura a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> utilizzando gli operatori di overload.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è progettato per essere utilizzato con un Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollare questo codice in un form e chiamare il `AddShadow` metodo quando si gestisce il modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento.

trans-unit.source: Be sure that the form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> named `listBox1`.
trans-unit.target: Assicurarsi che il form contiene un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> denominato `listBox1`.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Confronta due oggetti <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The result specifies whether the values of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> properties of the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> objects are unequal.
trans-unit.target: Il risultato specifica se i valori delle proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> o <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> dei due oggetti <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> sono diversi.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the values of either the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> properties or the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> properties of <paramref name="left" /> and <paramref name="right" /> differ; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se i valori <paramref name="left" /> e <paramref name="right" /> delle proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> o delle proprietà <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> differiscono tra loro; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the pair of numbers to subtract from the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> che specifica la coppia di numeri da sottrarre dalle coordinate di <c>pt</c>.

trans-unit.source: Translates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> by the negative of a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte un elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in base al valore negativo di un elemento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure that is translated by the negative of a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> traslata in base al valore negativo di una determinata struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.PointConverter> and the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Subtraction%2A> operator.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.PointConverter> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Subtraction%2A> operatore.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è progettato per essere utilizzato con Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste this code into a form and call the `ShowPointConverter` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Incollare il codice in un form e chiamare il `ShowPointConverter` metodo quando si gestisce il modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento passando `e` come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> object by rounding the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> values to the nearest integer.
trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> specificato in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> arrotondando i valori di <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> agli interi più vicini.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> this method converts to.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in cui questo metodo esegue la conversione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to be subtracted from.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> da cui eseguire la sottrazione.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> to subtract from the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> da sottrarre dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of subtracting specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> from the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il risultato della sottrazione dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> specificata dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that is the result of the subtraction operation.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> che rappresenta il risultato dell'operazione di sottrazione.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Subtract%2A> subtracts the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> of the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Size> from the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of the specified point.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Subtract%2A> sottrae il <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> dell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Drawing.Size> dal <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> i valori del punto specificato.

trans-unit.source: Converts this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to a human-readable string.
trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in una stringa leggibile.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che rappresenta questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> by truncating the values of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> specificato in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> troncando i valori dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> this method converts to.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> in cui questo metodo esegue la conversione.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la coordinata x di questo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Coordinata x della struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operator and how to construct a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> from a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> or two integers.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operatore e come costruire un <xref:System.Drawing.Point> da un <xref:System.Drawing.Size> o due valori integer.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Viene inoltre illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è progettato per essere utilizzato con Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`, and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Incollare il codice in un form contenente un pulsante denominato `Button1`e associare il `Button1_Click` (metodo) con il pulsante <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la coordinata y di questo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Coordinata y della struttura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operator and how to construct a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> from a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> or two integers.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operatore e come costruire un <xref:System.Drawing.Point> da un <xref:System.Drawing.Size> o due valori integer.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Viene inoltre illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio è progettato per essere utilizzato con Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`, and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Incollare il codice in un form contenente un pulsante denominato `Button1`e associare il `Button1_Click` (metodo) con il pulsante <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> evento.
